WHY USE
RISE311?

WHY USE
RISE311?

settings.heading: Complete Protein: RISE311 isn’t just another protein shake.  It provides all the amino acids in the right balance.

settings.text:
Each amino acid plays its part in building and preserving muscle. You are putting the work in, you deserve the best results.

Top of the Protein Charts:  The PDCAAS is a score for measuring how complete a protein is. For example, whey proteins almost universally score a 1.0 – the highest possible score. Plant proteins, like pea, rice, fava bean, and hemp are all low in certain amino acids, giving a PDCAAS score of .5 – .8. 

Being plant-based shouldn’t mean sacrificing performance.  Which is why we didn’t stop tweaking until each of our RISE311 protein powders scored a 1.0.  With RISE311, you get the same protein score as whey, without the additional stress to your body.

Lovin’ the Leucine: Meet the amino acid king. RISE311 has 3 grams of leucine per serving (way above most plant proteins), ensuring your fitness efforts aren’t wasted.  Leucine is  there to trigger muscle growth and/or maintain your physique. That’s the anabolic pathway at work, and we’ve got it dialed in.

Footnote:  Normally, a true PDCAAS score requires a study with rats where in the end you kill them. We aren't down with that.  So instead we base our PDCAAS score off calculations based off standards set up by NHANES from 2013 (so often called PDCAAS NHANES 2013).

Most proteins are tough to digest. Your body has to break down the protein into all of the individual amino acids...tough work for your digestive system.

Whey is particularly challenging for your body because of the lactose and large peptides.  This leads to bloating, nausea, and cramping.  Plant-based proteins often come from “legumes” which are notoriously hard to digest (we’re all aware of  their “musical” reputation).  

RISE311 is Gentle on your Gut: This is all thanks to our 3 in 1 process designed to take the stress out of digestion. Our barley protein is sprouted.  Our pea protein is fermented.  This means each of our proteins are “pre-digested” – making them a breeze for your body to process. Thirdly, we mix our powerful enzyme blend for an effortless breakdown of our proteins in the digestive tract.  It’s protein, without the grumbles. 

Absorption, Upgraded:  The  powerful enzyme blend does more than make RISE311 easy to digest.  It also hydrolyzes the protein in your digestive tract.  This ensures your muscles get flooded with the amino acids they need, right when they need them. It’s like having a fast track for muscle repair.

And the cherry on the cake: No discomfort, ever.

settings.title: The Pursuit of Perfection
settings.text: Getting RISE311 to taste this good was no small feat. It took us 311 tries, but we crafted a flavor that’s luxurious in every sip. It’s smooth, it's rich, and it builds delightfully on your palate.

settings.title: The Sweet Spot
settings.text: Instead of sugar or other artificial sweeteners, we use Reboside M for sweetness. Extracted from the stevia plant, it’s the Rolls Royce of stevia (none of that “usual aftertaste.”) It’s both ultra-premium and ultra-clean. And yes, that means no calories or sugar.

settings.text: Pair text with an image to focus on your chosen product, collection, or blog post. Add details on availability, style, or even provide a review.
